prompts: Create an Electric-type Pokemon with bright yellow fur and a lightning bolt tail.
Imagine a playful Pokemon that sparks joy and energy in any environment.
Design a medium-sized Pokemon that loves to explore urban landscapes and forests.
Show me a Pokemon with long ears and a mischievous personality, perfect for a comic.
Generate a Pokemon that can harness electricity and has a sleek, agile body.
Make a Pokemon that evolves from a smaller form and is known for its speed.
Give me a vision of a Pokemon that radiates positivity and has a cheerful demeanor.
